name.baseName: Brick production ; permeable brick ; Curing process
砖生产 ; 透水砖 ; 固化工艺

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Production process of permeable bricks in non sintered bricks
非烧结砖块中的透水砖生产工艺

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is the area of 1 m2 brick products.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents permeable concrete bricks produced by Jinan Shunde Cement Products Co. Ltd. These bricks are utilized primarily in the construction of pavement that allows water to pass through, reducing runoff and enabling groundwater recharge. The bricks are suitable for sidewalks, walkways, plazas, driveways and other outdoor surfaces where stormwater management and ecological considerations are essential.
本数据集代表由济南顺德水泥制品有限公司生产的透水混凝土砖。这些砖主要用于建造允许水通过的路面，减少径流并促进地下水补给。这些砖适用于人行道、步行道、广场、车道和其他需要雨水管理和生态考虑的户外表面。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: ReCiPe midpoint (H) model is applied in this study.
本研究采用了 ReCiPe midpoint（H）模型。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: In this study, the production energy consumption of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick as well as the relevant data of all kinds of raw materials and energy input and exhaust emissions are collected from Jinan Shunde Cement Products Co. Ltd. Shandong Province.
本研究从济南顺德水泥制品有限公司收集了混凝土路面砖和透水砖的生产能耗以及各种原材料、能源投入和废气排放的相关数据。济南顺德水泥制品有限公司 山东省。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Most data of raw materials, energy input and waste discharge were collected from the site investigation of manufacturer. Water reducer is also called water reducing agent, whose chemical constituents is the sodium salt of the sulfonate formaldehyde condensation
原材料、能源投入和废物排放的大部分数据都是从生产厂家的现场调查中收集的。减水剂，其化学成分是磺酸钠盐的甲醛缩合物
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This data set is designed for use in Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of pavement brick products, specifically concrete pavement brick and permeable brick. Users should apply the ReCiPe midpoint (H) model as a methodological framework for impact assessment. The functional unit for data interpretation is 1 square meter of brick product. When using this data, pay particular attention to the variations in input and output related to changes in key processes, adhering to the 5% change principle for sensitivity analysis. Data regarding raw material consumption, energy inputs, and exhaust emissions must be considered and factored into the assessment appropriately. The water reducer, as a raw material, must be accounted for based on its chemical composition as a sodium salt of the sulfonate formaldehyde condensate.

本数据集旨在用于对路面砖产品进行生命周期评估（LCA），特别是混凝土路面砖和透水砖。用户应使用 ReCiPe midpouint (H) 模型作为影响评估的方法论框架。数据解释的功能单位是 1 平方米的砖制品。在使用这些数据时，应特别注意关键工序变化中输入和输出的变化，坚持5%的变化原则进行敏感性分析。必须考虑有关原材料消耗、能源投入和废气排放的数据，并适当地纳入评估中。其中减水剂作为原材料，必须根据其作为磺酸钠盐类甲醛缩合物的化学组成进行核算。

completeness.common:other: In this research, the sensitivity analysis was carried out according to the principle of 5% variation for input and output in the change of key processes.
在本研究中，根据关键工序变化中输入和输出变化 5%的原则进行了敏感性分析。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
